abstract.t: The multiple Destination option on IPv6(MDO6) is an elastic multicastdelivery system. MDO6 uses a list of final unicast addresses of eachdestination node that is embedded into an optional routing header, asthe destination of a datagram. Routers on the multicast path couldforward datagrams by looking up the next hop router for individualfinal unicast addresses with the existing unicast routing table.
